name: Obsidian Flow
description: Classic monochrome elegance with subtle shimmer. Perfect for dark mode.

name: Neon City
description: High contrast neon lights reflecting on wet pavement. Cyberpunk aesthetic.

name: Liquid Sunset
description: Warm gradients melting into twilight. Relaxing and energetic.

name: Deep Sea
description: Calm, mysterious depths with bioluminescent hints.

name: Gilded Silk
description: Luxurious metallic gold flowing smoothly. Premium feel.

name: Fresh Mint
description: Bright and airy vibe with soft greens. Clean and modern.

name: Dreamy Cloud
description: Soft pastel pinks and blues. Playful and light.

name: Northern Lights
description: Ethereal mix of greens, purples, and blues dancing in the dark.

name: Molten Core
description: Intense heat and energy with dark reds and bright yellows.

name: Royal Velvet
description: Deep purple and gold for a majestic and rich appearance.

name: Toxic Sludge
description: Edgy, high-tech vibe with neon greens and deep blacks.
